findings.title: _burnFrom(address,uint256) internal
findings.description: The _burnFrom function is declared as internal and not called from any other function, allowing any Ethereum address to transfer tokens on behalf of another account and burn tokens.

findings.title: Lack of Pause Functionality
findings.description: Smart contract doesn't have functionality to pause smart contract in case of any attack or bug found in smart contract, which would stop all functionalities including transfer() and transferFrom().
